sections.heading: S:
sections.template: {{#if subjective.chiefComplaintText}}Pt's chief complaint is {{subjective.chiefComplaintText}}.{{/if}}{{#if subjective.historyProviderText}} History provided by {{subjective.historyProviderText}}.{{/if}}{{#if subjective.symptomsList}} Pertinent symptoms include {{subjective.symptomsList}}.{{/if}}{{#if subjective.painScaleText}} Pain rated {{subjective.painScaleText}}/10.{{/if}}{{#if subjective.opqrstSentence}}{{#if subjective.hasBaseNarrative}} {{/if}}{{subjective.opqrstSentence}}{{/if}}{{#if subjective.sampleSentence}}{{#if subjective.hasLeadBeforeSample}} {{/if}}{{subjective.sampleSentence}}{{/if}}{{#if subjective.notes}}{{#if subjective.hasNarrative}} {{/if}}{{subjective.notes}}{{/if}}

sections.heading: O:

sections.heading: P:
